Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: 在游戏里查看玩家在FFLogs上的数据的插件。
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.0.0.0: Complete rewrite of the plugin, see in /fflogs for more info.
- 2.0.0.1: Fix /fflogs placeholders not opening the window.
- 2.0.1.0: Add context menu button back, this is currently disabled in Dalamud, but will automatically work once fixed.
- 2.0.2.0: Improved party members feature UI.
- 2.0.2.1: Fix a plugin crash with corrupted config.
- 2.0.3.0: Add all stars points/rank/rank% stats + number of decimal digits setting.
